articles.description: Disney fans finally got their first look “The Little Mermaid” live-action film starring Halle Bailey as Ariel after a teaser trailer dropped at D23 Expo over the weekend.
articles.content:
ATLANTA — Disney fans finally got their first look The Little Mermaid live-action film starring Halle Bailey as Ariel after a teaser trailer dropped at D23 Expo over the weekend.
